name: Boo-Dunnit!
description:
There's been a murder! Can you decide on a culprit in this Halloween themed mystery?

I'm bugaboggle and I made this game myself for the Spooktober 4th annual visual novel jam .
I mostly made this to see if I could but I hope someone still has some fun with it!

Warnings for:

Adult themes

Implied violence and some gore (There will be a cartoony dead body and cartoon blood)
